Eichiro Tanaka was a samurai in the town of Aru in Wa.
Eichiro was the son of Eiji Tanaka, a fellow general of Benju Matsutomo. During a battle, Eiji betrayed his army but Benju managed to win and executed Eiji for treason. Eichiro however believed that Benju killed his father out of jealousy over the mans superior generalship and promised vengeance. 
In 1358 DR, he hired the ninja Yamaguchi clan to kill the pilgrims going to the local Shining Temple of Bishamon. His goal was to ruin the Ceremony of the Three Thousand Steps and become the next daimyo of Aru, after Benjus demotion.
Eichiro hated Benju but was not yet sure if getting revenge against the daimyo was his idea or Satomis.
